welcome_message:
👋 Hi, {name}! Welcome to Language Exchange Bot!

🌟 Here you'll find conversation partners for language learning!

🚀 Let's set up your profile:
choose_interests: 🎯 Choose your interests (you can select multiple):
profile_completed:
✅ Great! Your profile is ready!

🔍 Starting to search for suitable conversation partners...
profile_actions: What would you like to do?
profile_reset_warning: This will clear your languages and interests. Are you sure?
profile_reset_done: ✅ Profile has been reset. Let's start again!
choose_at_least_one_interest: Please choose at least one interest
feedback_text:
💌 Thanks for your feedback!

Please write what worries you or what ideas you have to improve the bot.

📝 Feedback should be 10 to 1000 characters long.
feedback_too_short:
❌ Feedback too short!

Minimum: 10 characters
Current: {count} characters
feedback_too_long:
❌ Feedback too long!

Maximum: 1000 characters
Current: {count} characters
feedback_saved:
✅ Thank you for your feedback!

We will review your request as soon as possible.
feedback_contact_request:
🌐 You don't have a username in Telegram

Please provide how we can contact you for a response:

📱 Phone, 📧 Email or other @username
feedback_error_generic: An error occurred while saving the feedback. Please try again later.
feedback_contact_missing: 👨‍💻 User didn't provide contacts for response
feedback_welcome:
💬 Feedback to developers

Tell us about your experience using the bot, what problems you have or suggestions for improvement.
profile_not_completed:
🤔 You don't have a profile yet!

Please fill in information about yourself - this will help find suitable conversation partners.
empty_profile_message:
🤔 You don't have a profile yet!

Please fill in information about yourself - this will help find suitable conversation partners.
access_denied: ❌ You don't have permission to execute this command
